name: HSP_RULES_INFO
description: The HSP_RULES_INFO table contains information about hospital billing workqueue rules.

columns.name: RULE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the rule record.

columns.name: RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the hospital billing workqueue rule.

columns.name: RULE_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the hospital billing workqueue rule.
